filter.type.exact_count.tooltip: Transfer only if it has same count as the defined filter
filter.type.mod.tooltip: Transfer only if it has the same mod id as the defined filter
filter.type.normal.tooltip: Transfer only if it is the same as the filter
filter.type.regulating.tooltip: Transfer to keep the defined filter amount on the destination
filter.type.tag.tooltip: Transfer only if it has the same tag as the defined in the filter
